# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the column slice.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Column Slice

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the column slice suitable for debugging.
- **customMirror**: A mirror that reflects the column slice.
